ygData.subject: Re: Cleric Armor Quest
ygData.msgSnippet: Hello All!  This is my first post to this forum.  I have been reading emails on this list for some time now, and I have found much valuable information here.
ygData.messageBody:
Hello All! This is my first post to this forum. I have been reading emails
on this list for some time now, and I have found much valuable information
here. My thanks to all for my increased knowledge.

I am trying to complete the cleric armor quest for the greaves. I already
have the ingot, but I need to find the icon. The quest info I have
indicates that I must kill the erudite Maugrim who spawns in Kerra Ridge on
the necro isle. I have been there and I have not found Maugrim. Does
anyone have more details as to where Maugrim spawns, or how to get it to
spawn? I would greatly appreciate any information you may have.

Thank you!

Mariola on Povar
